tech_news.title: The Linux Kernel Looks To "Bite The Bullet" In Enabling Microsoft C Extensions - Phoronix
tech_news.description: Two patches queued into the Linux kernel's build system development tree, kbuild-next, would enable the -fms-extensions compiler argument everywhere for allowing GCC and LLVM/Clang to use the Microsoft C Extensions when compiling the Linux kernel

tech_news.title: Players slam Battlefield 6 XP cap: "EA managed to make progression time-gated in a premium game, and nobody's talking about it" - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Battlefield 6 has a daily XP cap and yes, that applies during double XP weekends, too.
